title: aDimaiyin uLLa (kaNNigaL)
sahitya:
aDimaiyin uLLa (kaNNigaL).  rAgA: vasantA.  tALA: Adi
 


1:  aDimaiyin uLLak-kuDishaiyil ArAvamudan tOnrinAn kAma mudhl
  koDiya asurar paDai maDiya aruL vaDiva azhagan tOnrinAn
 caraNam 2    tOzhan vijayanukkA tErOTTiya pArthasArthi tOnrinAn
  Ezhai manam magizhvAzhiyil muzhuga azhagan tOnrinAn
 caraNam 3    shIrvaLar maduraiyil shishupAlan talai koyya sEvakan tOnrinAn
  mArbai viTTaghalAda rukmiNiyODuDan mana shiraiyil tOnrinAn
 caraNam 4    kOmaLan mOhana shyAmaLar sarva mangaLan tOnRinAn
  nAmam maravaa rAmadAsan karpazhiyAmal kAkkak-kaNNan tOnrinAn
